string-array.name: tutorialDesc
string-array.item: Click on the PLUS sign to add a new Task to the list.
When clicking on the help button this tutorial will overlay the screen. you can remove it by touching anywere on screen.
Click on the Mic button to quickly add a new Task to the list via voice. Note that the task will be added with the default values and no description.
The MAP section provides a location based position view of your tasks. Loading might take a while and depends on your location base service.
Navigate to the Settings section and define how your application will behave. You can adjust the sharing intencity, database backup, notifications and etc.
